001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config;
002
003import org.springframework.boot.SpringBootConfiguration;
004import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan;
005
006/**
007 * Configuration class for setting up the test execution environment.
008 *
009 * <p>This class enables component scanning within the framework and allows
010 * dynamic resolution of the project package for test execution.
011 *
012 * <p>The {@code @SpringBootConfiguration} annotation marks this class as a configuration source,
013 * and {@code @ComponentScan} ensures that the required beans are loaded from
014 * the specified base packages.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@SpringBootConfiguration
019@ComponentScan(basePackages = {
020   "io.cyborgcode.roa.framework",
021   "${project.packages}"
022
023})
024public class TestConfig {
025
026}
